title: Key Fragments
body:
I play maybe 10-20 games a week, and probably have a average of 55% wins, yet i have not received a key frag in over three weeks.
Now i get that they arn't supposed to be a common drop rate as such, but this just seems a little too long to go without one.
Has anyway else had the same kind of in frequent drop, or is it just me.

Thanks for any reply's.

replies.body:
welp my friend has 9 forged keys to his name.
Really unfair tbh
I get more wins, crazy system..
just you. I got like 10 key fragments over the past month. Though i do play 4-5 games a day.
